name: spo-export-content-type-details-to-csv
title: Export Content Type Details To CSV
shortDescription: This script exports all content types available on a SharePoint site to CSV.
longDescription: This script exports all content types available on a SharePoint site, including basic information such as Name, ID, Scope, Schema, Fields, and more, into a CSV format.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Export Content Type Details To CSV
